summary: REQ-33/REQ-34 appear implemented via base-path-aware static URLs and inline rendering of both photos. REQ-35 is only partially addressed: state resets on `src` change, but there is no retry path for transient failures without a `src` change. The diff also introduces a fullscreen/overlay celebration viewer, which directly violates the stated constraint/non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a graceful retry-friendly rendering path so transient decode/load issues do not permanently lock the component into the fallback state.
missing_requirements.reason: `CelebrationPhoto` sets `hasError` permanently on error and renders only the fallback UI. It resets only when `src` changes (or remount with new `src`), but offers no retry mechanism (e.g., retry button/timer) when `src` is unchanged, so transient errors can still leave the user stuck.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a fullscreen/lightbox/overlay celebration viewer that auto-opens, locks background scroll, and shows the photos in an overlay experience.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly disallowed by constraints: “Do not introduce any fullscreen/lightbox/overlay behavior for the celebration photos” and non-goal mentions no fullscreen/lightbox auto-open. This component is not requested for fixing inline photo loading.
